delta.notes: Compact setup; best for small SKU batches or reshoots.
Two studio days + expanded retouching, additional angles/variants.

billing.cancellationPolicy: ≥7 business days: full refund of deposit; 3–6 days: 50% of deposit; <3 days: deposit non-refundable plus pass-throughs.

summaryAtList.notes: Margin improves with higher SKU throughput, add-ons, or client-provided studio.

baselineSkusPerDay.assumptions: Standard pack shots, 3–5 angles per SKU.

throughput.returnsPolicy: 1 round of retouch notes per select included (light fixes). Additional rounds billed hourly.

addons.label: Ghost-mannequin / flat-lay advanced retouch
addons.notes: Complex masking/compositing; turnaround +1–2 biz days depending on volume.

addons.label: 360° spin / stop-motion clips
addons.notes: Requires turntable; confirm reflective/complex surfaces ahead of time.

addons.label: Lifestyle mini-set
addons.notes: Simple prop set; surfaces/props are pass-through at cost.

addons.label: RAW delivery with usage agreement
addons.notes: Includes checksum manifest; no color guarantees beyond provided profile.

addons.label: Rush delivery (48h after selects)
addons.notes: Subject to calendar and SKU complexity; confirms at booking.

milestones.label: Kickoff
milestones.exitCriteria: Brief approved; shot list finalized; studio penciled.

milestones.label: Studio booked
milestones.exitCriteria: COI issued if required; call sheet sent.

milestones.label: Shoot complete
milestones.exitCriteria: Take ingested + checksum verified; backups created.

milestones.label: Proofs delivered
milestones.exitCriteria: Proof gallery link sent; selects requested.

milestones.label: Finals delivered
milestones.exitCriteria: Retouched selects delivered; license note sent.

requirements: SKU list with priority order & packaging removal notes
assumptions: Standard pack-shot complexity; reflective or transparent items reduce throughput.
One background color for the day; additional setups reduce throughput.
Client provides accurate SKU handling and any compliance guidance (e.g., regulated items).
risks: Late SKU delivery compresses retouch window and jeopardizes deadlines.
Highly reflective/transparent materials require additional time or specialized surfaces.
Studio availability can change; holds expire if deposit is delayed.
acceptanceCriteria: 20 retouched selects delivered in agreed formats (web JPG sRGB + print TIFF).
Color alignment within tolerance to provided references and calibration target.
File naming per standard and delivery to agreed folder or link.
qaChecklist: Camera sensor clean; lenses tested; backup body present.
ColorChecker reference captured per lighting setup.
Deliverables validated against shot list prior to handoff.

compliance.releases: Model/property releases not expected for product-only shoots; confirm if branded locations appear.
compliance.safety: Gaffer tape/cable covers; weight bags on stands; no blocked egress; electrical load within studio limits.

triggers: Additional background setups beyond the planned set
Throughput expansion (more SKUs/angles) after schedule lock
changeRequests.process: Estimate sent via change order; work starts after written approval.

analytics.postmortemNotes: Capture typical throughput by product category to refine quoting tables.
